explanation: [0-0] A man in a red shirt and black pants stands by the racetrack with his hands raised. Behind him is a motorcycle the same color as his shirt. In the distance, several motorcyclists are riding their motorcycles, and some staff members are also standing by the track, looking at the riders. There are white subtitles in the picture.

[0-6] At this time, a motorcyclist rides down the track. The man turns his head to look at the motorcycle behind him and hurriedly bends down to grab the motorcycle that is running towards him. The rider jumps to the ground, and the numbers on the screen begin to change. The rider turns around and straddles the motorcycle behind the man, returning to the track with the help of the staff as the numbers on the screen freeze.
